General Questions.question: What is Astronomy Co.?
General Questions.answer: Astronomy Co. is a platform that provides information and resources about the universe, offering insights on various astronomical phenomena.

General Questions.question: Is Astronomy Co. free to use?
General Questions.answer: Yes, Astronomy Co. is completely free to use. We aim to share knowledge about the universe without any cost to our users.

Account & Login.question: How do I create an account?
Account & Login.answer: To create an account, simply click on the 'Login / Sign up' link in the navigation bar and fill out the registration form.

Account & Login.question: I forgot my password. What should I do?
Account & Login.answer: If you've forgotten your password, click on the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page to reset it.

Content and Resources.question: What kind of resources are available?
Content and Resources.answer: Astronomy Co. offers articles, FAQs, and blog posts covering a variety of topics related to astronomy and space exploration.

Content and Resources.question: How frequently is the content updated?
Content and Resources.answer: Our content is updated regularly to ensure the most accurate and current information is available.

Support.question: How can I contact support?
Support.answer: You can contact support by sending an email to support@astronomyco.com, or through our live chat option available on the Contact page.

Support.question: What should I do if I encounter an issue?
Support.answer: If you encounter any issues, please reach out to us through our support email or live chat, and we will assist you as soon as possible.
